inscription:
LLC in black ink: dear Sam May/you have some of/the real taste of the/great Spain/on this occassion my sincerest Beauford Delaney

R edge on back in black ink: Mr. Spanier
medium: Gouache and watercolor on cream paper
signed: LRC in black ink: Beauford Delaney / 55 / Spain
title: Abstract Composition
